animation.display_neural_network¶

class animation.display_neural_network.NeuralNetwork(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: manim.Scene

A class to visualize a neural network using Manim.

This class constructs a visual representation of a neural network based on the data provided in the JSON file. It handles the placement of neurons, the drawing of connections, and the animation of neuron activations.

construct()[source]¶

Constructs the neural network visualization, applies forces to neurons, and animates their activations.

class animation.display_neural_network.Neuron(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: manim.VMobject

A class to represent a single neuron in the neural network visualization.

radius¶

The radius of the neuron’s visual representation.

Type

float

color¶

The color of the neuron.

Type

m.Color

original_color¶

The original color of the neuron.

Type

m.Color

original_radius¶

The original radius of the neuron.

Type

float

circle¶

The visual representation of the neuron.

Type

m.Circle

deactivate()[source]¶
animation.display_neural_network.directed_to_undirected(adj_matrix)[source]¶

Converts a directed adjacency matrix to an undirected one.

Parameters

adj_matrix (list of list of int) – The directed adjacency matrix.

Returns

undirected_matrix – The undirected adjacency matrix.

Return type

np.ndarray

animation.display_neural_network.draw_graph(matrix, name='Directed Graph')[source]¶

Draws a directed graph using NetworkX.

Parameters

  • matrix (list of list of int) – The adjacency matrix representing the graph.

  • name (str, optional) – The title of the graph. Default is “Directed Graph”.

Displays the adjacency matrix using Seaborn’s heatmap.

Parameters

matrix (list of list of int) – The adjacency matrix.
